Judul: ANALISIS BUDAYA ORGANISASI DENGAN MENGGUNAKAN ORGANIZATIONAL CULTURE ASSESSMENT INSTRUMENT (OCAI) BERDASARKAN COMPETING VALUES FRAMEWORK (CVF)
Abstrak:
Based on the researches that have been done before, organizational culture becomes one of the important factors in determining success of a company achieving its goals. Researcher assumes that organizational culture is a set of value that can influence habitual behavior, as well as the performance of the people in it. To prove it, author conducted a case study on what kind of organizational culture is currently dominating and that the preferred culture in the next three years in Kompas Gramedia Corporate Human Resource (CHR) division by using the Competing Values Framework based on six dimensions of organizational culture using Organizational Culture Assessment Instrument (OCAI).

The objective of this study is to provide cultural recommendations according to the expectations of all organizational actors. The research methodology used is quantitative data, by distributing questionnaires to all CHR Kompas Gramedia employees with the total population of 71 people. From the total population, 67 people filled out and completed all the questions asked in the questionnaire. The questionnaire contains eight statements in each dimension, which are divided into four current cultural statements and four expected cultural statements. 

Based on the results of the study, the overall organizational culture that is dominated in the CHR Kompas Gramedia is the hierarchy culture with 28.12 points. The clan culture gets the lowest culture with a total of 23.70 points. CHR Kompas Gramedia is dominated by culture that characterized by a highly structured place and following formal policies of the company. People want their organization to be efficient, controlled, stable, and prioritizing low-costs production process. In the next three years, this organization expects a culture that is inclined to be dominated by clan culture with a number of 32.10 points, by reducing the hierarchy culture by the amount of 18.66 which is currently embedded in the company. They want a culture of family, warm, open, loyal, have a great trust in each other, participate in every activity, work in teams, and prioritize the development of human resources. They also want to be guided and mentored by their leaders in their daily work.

From the results of research that has been done, CHR Kompas Gramedia can conduct training such as mindfulness, personal transformation coaching training, team building-learning, bottom-up approach, and apply the new organizational climate in order to get expected culture.
Kata Kunci: Organizational Culture, OCAI, CVF, Clan, Adhocracy, Market, Hierarchy
